snippet.title: Azure Striker GUNVOLT 2 - The 1st Trailer
snippet.description:
Azure Striker GUNVOLT 2 hits the Nintendo 3DS eShop in Summer 2016! 

The story continues with Gunvolt and his rival Copen as playable characters! Copen, making his debut as a playable character, has a high-flying, in your face play style that is quite different from Gunvolt's. 

A formidable new enemy awaits. Are you up for the challenge?
